Description:
Creates containers for a service.
This command is deprecated. Use the `up` command with `--no-start` instead.

data.--force-recreate: Recreate containers even if their configuration and image haven't changed. Incompatible with --no-recreate.
data.--no-recreate: If containers already exist, don't recreate them. Incompatible with --force-recreate.
data.--no-build: Don't build an image, even if it's missing.
